attributes.comment:
We have completed 2 adoptions in the last 4 years and have had wonderful
service from our local office. However, we feel the proposed fee increase is
unwarranted and will add undue fiscal burden for families. This is especially true
since increased wait times for adoption result in many families having to file twice
while they are in process for the same adoption. If any fee increase is approved it
should be paired with increased value to the families such as an extension of the
period of aproval i.e., up to 24 months and/or a greatly reduced fee if the family
has to file twice for the same adoption due to an expired approval. This should be
about children, families and value added services to US citizens, Thanks for your
consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Suzanne Santarcangelo
